text: The Men's 100 metre freestyle competition of the 2019 African Games was held on 21 August 2019. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text- align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|César Cielo||align=left|||align=left|46.91||Rome||30 July 2009 |- |African record||align=left|Lyndon Ferns||align=left|||align=left|47.79||Rome||29 July 2009 |- |Games record||align=left|Salim Iles||align=left|||align=left|49.38||Algiers||12 July 2007 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nation !! Time !!
